displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Hand Cannon
displayProperties.description: Aiming down sights loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against  [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Beyond The Veil
displayProperties.description: Guardians you make invisible gain damage resistance.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Armaments
displayProperties.description: Weapons takedowns with a damage type that matches your subclass element have an escalating chance to spawn an elemental well.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Light
displayProperties.description: Defeating a combatant with your Super spawns an elemental well that matches your subclass energy type.

displayProperties.name: Causality Quiver
displayProperties.description:
Perfectly drawn arrows that detonate Sacred Flames increase arrow damage.

Striking targets unaffected by Sacred Flame instead refreshes Causality Arrows' duration.

displayProperties.name: Bottomless Grief
displayProperties.description: While you are the last living member of your fireteam, each takedown refills your magazine.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Armaments
displayProperties.description: Weapons takedowns with a damage type that matches your subclass element have an escalating chance to spawn an elemental well.

displayProperties.name: Mortal Polarity
displayProperties.description: Precision hits create a lightning storm.

displayProperties.name: Aeon's Vow
displayProperties.description: Gain class ability energy as your allies die. Gain full class ability energy when you resurrect an ally.

displayProperties.name: Lightgiver Chant
displayProperties.description: When you cast your Super, nearby allies gain an instant burst of healing. Aeon cult allies who do not have the Sect of Vigor role equipped also gain an overshield.

displayProperties.name: Glacial Inheritance
displayProperties.description: Defeating targets with your Stasis Super refunds Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Lasting Impression
displayProperties.description: Rockets attach on impact and detonate after a delay. Increases blast radius and damage.

displayProperties.name: Frenzy
displayProperties.description: Being in combat for an extended time increases damage, handling, and reload for this weapon until you are out of combat.

displayProperties.name: Overload Auto Rifle
displayProperties.description:
Landing sustained hits on combatants with any Auto Rifle you are wielding disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. 

After any member of your fireteam stuns a Champion, your Auto Rifles gain a temporary bonus to damage against Champions.

displayProperties.name: Armsbearer Chant
displayProperties.description: When you use a finisher on an Elite, you generate Special ammo for your fireteam; when you use a finisher on a boss or miniboss, you generate Heavy ammo for your fireteam. Nearby Aeon cult allies who do not have the Sect of Insight role equipped also gain a bonus to weapon damage for a short time.

displayProperties.name: Aeon's Inspiration
displayProperties.description: Successive precision weapon takedowns have a chance to drop an Orb of Power for your allies.

displayProperties.name: Bow Reloader
displayProperties.description: Increases reload speed of Bows.

displayProperties.name: Overload Bow
displayProperties.description: Damage by fully drawn arrows disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Submachine Gun Loader
displayProperties.description: Increases reload speed of Submachine Guns.

displayProperties.name: Overload Bow
displayProperties.description: Damage by fully drawn arrows disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Hammer of the Warmind
displayProperties.description:
The detonations from Warmind Cells you destroy cause disruption, stunning combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption]  Overload Champions  and [Stagger]  Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Hammer of the Warmind
displayProperties.description:
The detonations from Warmind Cells you destroy cause disruption, stunning combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption]  Overload Champions  and [Stagger]  Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Disrupting Blade
displayProperties.description:
Landing consecutive hits with any Sword you are wielding disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption]  Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Overload Rounds
displayProperties.description:
Landing consecutive hits on enemy targets disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption]  Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Bleak Watcher
displayProperties.description: Press and hold the grenade button to convert your grenade into a [Stasis] Stasis turret that fires slowing projectiles at nearby targets.

displayProperties.name: Anti-Barrier Rounds
displayProperties.description: Shield-piercing rounds designed to bypass combatant defenses. Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: Anti-Barrier Ranger
displayProperties.description: Grants weapon shield-piercing, bypassing combatant defenses. Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: Whisper of Bonds
displayProperties.description: Defeating frozen targets grants you Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Impulse Amplifier
displayProperties.description: Massively increases projectile velocity, increases reload speed.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Charge
displayProperties.description: Become Charged with Light by picking up an elemental well. If the elemental well's element type matches your subclass element, you gain 2 stacks of Charged with Light.

displayProperties.name: Thermal Overload
displayProperties.description:
Solar and Stasis grenades disrupt combatants, stunning them, delaying ability regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Cryoclasm
displayProperties.description: Shattering a frozen target spawns seekers that track and freeze other nearby targets.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Charge
displayProperties.description: Become Charged with Light by picking up an elemental well. If the elemental well's element type matches your subclass element, you gain 2 stacks of Charged with Light.

displayProperties.name: Glacial Quake
displayProperties.description:
Summon a Stasis gauntlet. While your Super is active:

  : Slam your gauntlet down to create a shockwave that freezes targets and sends out crystals to freeze additional ones.

  : Supercharge your Shiver Strike for bonus damage. Sprint through crystals or frozen targets to shatter them instantly.

displayProperties.name: Anti-Barrier Pulse Rifle
displayProperties.description:
Pulse Rifles you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

Pulse Rifles deal bonus damage against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: Foebreaker Chant
displayProperties.description: When you stun a Champion or defeat a boss/miniboss, your nearby fireteam members gain a burst of grenade and melee energy. Aeon cult allies who do not have the Sect of Force role equipped also gain a burst of Super energy.

displayProperties.name: Aeon's Wrath
displayProperties.description: Rapid precision hits with a weapon temporarily increase your reload speed and weapon swap speed.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Armaments
displayProperties.description: Weapons takedowns with a damage type that matches your subclass element have an escalating chance to spawn an elemental well.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Charge
displayProperties.description: Become Charged with Light by picking up an elemental well. If the elemental well's element type matches your subclass element, you gain 2 stacks of Charged with Light.

displayProperties.name: Sidearm Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Sidearms.

displayProperties.name: Focusing Lens
displayProperties.description: Your Light abilities do bonus damage to combatants affected by Stasis.

displayProperties.name: Flare-Up
displayProperties.description: Immediately regain your melee charge when you or an ally stuns an [Stagger]  Unstoppable Champion.

displayProperties.name: Inferno Whip
displayProperties.description:
Solar melee abilities stun unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Sniper Rifle Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Sniper Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Bow Dexterity
displayProperties.description: Faster ready and stow speed for Bows.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Pulse Rifle
displayProperties.description:
Aiming down Pulse Rifle sights loads a high-impact burst that stuns unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Hand Cannon
displayProperties.description:
Aiming down sights with any Hand Cannon you are wielding loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger]  Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Causality Arrows
displayProperties.description:
•  Arrows fired while aiming down sights cause Sacred Flames to instantly detonate.

 •  Precision hits with perfectly drawn arrows increase the power of this detonation.

displayProperties.name: Overload Scout Rifle
displayProperties.description:
Landing consecutive hits on combatants with any Scout Rifle you are wielding disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. 

After any member of your fireteam disrupts a Champion, your Scout Rifles gain a temporary bonus to damage against Champions.

displayProperties.name: Gladitorial Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a chain-breaking appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Resonance Siphon
displayProperties.description: Gain [Stasis] Stasis ability energy whenever you or a member of your fireteam stuns a Champion.

displayProperties.name: Anti-Barrier Sidearm
displayProperties.description:
Grants weapon shield-piercing, bypassing combatant defenses.

Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: Unflinching Scout Rifle Aim
displayProperties.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Scout Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Sundering Glare
displayProperties.description: Rapid precision hits against distant combatants weaken them for a short duration.

displayProperties.name: Sniper Rifle Scavenger
displayProperties.description: Sniper Rifles get bonus reserves when you pick up Special ammo.

displayProperties.name: Overload Grenades
displayProperties.description: Void grenades disrupt combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Legion's Bulwark
displayProperties.description: Increases the Arc Shield's durability and partially reloads the magazine if it is destroyed.

displayProperties.name: Looks Can Kill
displayProperties.description: This weapon fires special shield-piercing ammunition. It comes with a scope. Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: Desperado
displayProperties.description: Reloading after a precision final blow increases your rate of fire.

displayProperties.name: Anti-Barrier Scout Rifle
displayProperties.description:
Scout Rifles you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

Scout Rifles deal bonus damage against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.description:
Grants weapon shield-piercing, bypassing combatant defenses.

Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: Font of Might
displayProperties.description: Picking up an elemental well that matches your subclass energy type grants a temporary bonus to weapon damage of that same elemental type.

displayProperties.name: Iron Reach
displayProperties.description: Massively improves weapon range at the cost of weapon stability.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Ordnance
displayProperties.description: Defeating a combatant with a grenade spawns an elemental well that matches your subclass energy type.

displayProperties.name: Disrupting Blade
displayProperties.description:
Landing consecutive hits on enemy targets disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption]  Overload Champions.

displayProperties.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Sniper Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Reactive Pulse
displayProperties.description: While Charged with Light, when you take damage while surrounded by combatants, you emit a burst of damaging Arc energy, consuming one stack of Charged with Light.

displayProperties.name: Absorption Cells
displayProperties.description: Gain Super energy on elemental weapon takedowns.

displayProperties.name: Breach Resonator
displayProperties.description: Grants melee and grenade energy on final blows with [Shield-Piercing] shield-piercing weapons or when a member of your fireteam stuns a Barrier Champion.

displayProperties.name: Judgment
displayProperties.description: Sustained damage with this weapon envelops the target in a field that weakens and stuns them. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Howl of the Storm
displayProperties.description: While sliding, activate your charged melee ability to launch a wave of [Stasis] Stasis energy forward that freezes targets and creates [Stasis] Stasis crystals.

displayProperties.description:
Aiming down Pulse Rifle sights loads a high-impact burst that stuns unshielded combatants.

Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.description: Become Charged with Light by picking up an elemental well. If the elemental well's element type matches your subclass element, you gain 2 stacks of Charged with Light.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Shot
displayProperties.description: Aiming down sights loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Adept Icarus Grip
displayProperties.description: Improves accuracy while airborne. Slightly increases weapon range.

displayProperties.name: Font of Might
displayProperties.description: Picking up an elemental well that matches your subclass energy type grants a temporary bonus to weapon damage of that same elemental type.

displayProperties.name: Adept Big Ones Spec
displayProperties.description: Deals extra damage against powerful combatants, bosses, and vehicles.

displayProperties.name: Ossified Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a bone spiral appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Heartbreaking Entrance
displayProperties.description: Adds a heartbreaking appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.description: Hipfired shots track targets.

displayProperties.name: Glorious Charge
displayProperties.description: Increases Thundercrash damage.

displayProperties.description: Shield-piercing rounds designed to bypass combatant defenses. Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.name: Grim Harvest
displayProperties.description: Defeating slowed or frozen combatants creates [Stasis] Stasis shards. These shards grant melee energy when picked up by you or your allies.

displayProperties.name: Font of Wisdom
displayProperties.description: Picking up an elemental well that matches your subclass energy type grants you a temporary significant increase in your Intellect, improving the recharge rate of your Super.

displayProperties.description:
Submachine Guns you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

displayProperties.description: Increases reload speed of Scout Rifles.

displayProperties.description: Improves targeting for Scout Rifles and Sniper Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Radiant Light
displayProperties.description: Casting your Super causes nearby allies to become Charged with Light.

displayProperties.name: Overload Submachine Gun
displayProperties.description:
Uninterrupted fire from your equipped SMGs grants bullets that stun combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.description: Adds a firing synapse to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.description: Defeating combatants with grenade abilities increases this weapon's damage.

displayProperties.description: Your melee energy recharges faster when you are near two or more combatants.

displayProperties.description: Damaging targets with a [Stasis] Stasis melee reloads your stowed weapons and grants you a temporary boost to weapon ready speed.

displayProperties.description: While you are near frozen targets or a friendly [Stasis] Stasis crystal, you take reduced damage from targets.

displayProperties.description: You gain grenade energy each time you take damage from combatants.

displayProperties.description: Gain bonus damage and charge rate during a slide after sprinting for a short duration.

displayProperties.description: Find Lure Mutation mods as extra rewards when completing activities for 24 hours.
